content: this water bottle holder is made from the bottom up with the double_crochet stitch and the mesh stitch for the body there are simple instructions as to how the base is made and the double_crochet stitch is so beginner friendly it is made in the round so there are no seams to sew up i use a worsted weight 4 yarn and an h hook i have included images of this bottle holder made with a solid colour a variegated yarn and also one with colour blocks you can choose when to change colours and make one that is all stripes if you like
